recipe.label: Tofu Ricotta recipes
ingredientLines: 1 (14-ounce) block extra firm tofu, drained and crumbled 1 1/2 tablespoons tahini 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped 3 tablespoons nutritional yeast Pinch of freshly ground nutmeg 1 1/2 teaspoons mellow white miso 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1/4 teaspoon ground
